subtitle: Usually made from plaice or sole fillets these trout dippers make an unusual change.

method.text: In a bowl, mix together the dip ingredients. Chill until needed.
Mix the paprika into the breadcrumbs.
Dust the fish in the seasoned flour. Then dip in the egg, shaking off any excess. Then coat well in the breadcrumbs.
Heat enough oil to come no more than half-way up the sides of a pan. Heat oil to 190°C. Fry the dippers in batches for 1-2 min or until golden and crispy.
Drain thoroughly on kitchen paper. Keep warm while repeating with remaining dippers. Serve with the dip.

title: Tempting trout dippers
